item.description:
G'day Canucks!

It is winter in Boston, and not as wintery as we would expect, but imagine if you will, a very warm beachy paradise way way south of the equator where our southern cousin's are about to celebrate their great birthday party!  Yes! Australia Day is upon us again and our expat friends are hosting their annual awesome everything-Aussie party at the Asgard in Cambridge.  I never miss it!  

Cheers,

Bruce

 

Here is Andrew's details from the Aussie expat site:

Ladies & Gentlemen, you are invited to Boston’s official Australia Day Party for 2012. For the second year running it will be held at the Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant on Saturday 28th January and is set to be the best yet. We have Australian music, Aussie beer, meat pies, raffles, auctions, giveaways as well as the annual ‘Peter Garrett-off*’. 

Festivities kick off at 1pm and will go long into the night. Get there early as space may run out.
Remember to get your Aussie costume together as there are prizes for the best dressed! 
All welcome and encouraged to fill their boots regardless of nationality. $10 entry to the best party of the year!

 

*Note: see the animated Peter Garrett of Midnight Oil on youtube to prepare. 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yd1IMmsOc6g

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day 2012!
